resources.string: "How much do you know of the DBU?"
¡Go ahead fighter! You can do it better
How much do you know of the DBU? is a unofficial quiz game about of one the most famous anime series of all time.
•You have 30 seconds to answer each question.
•The questions will appear in randomly order.
•Get the highest score in every game.
To get new functions or solve any problem. Update the App!
"What literary work is the series based on?"
"The story and characters of the serie were partly inspired by the Chinese folk novel Journey to the West, though they diverge from the novel very quickly."
"He gets run over by Bulma in her car"

"On his way home, dragging the fish, he gets run over by a teenage girl named Bulma in her car. Goku has never seen a car before and attacks, thinking that it is a monster; he picks up the car and throws it into the distance."
"What is the function of the Dragon Radar?"
"The Dragon Radar is a tracking device that makes finding the Dragon Balls more efficient, compared to conventional methods."
"The dragon balls ared used for grant one or many whishes."
"What is the dragon ball that Pilaf owns at the beginning of DB?"
"At the beginning of DB, Emperor's Pilaf first discovers the One-Star Dragon Ball and finds out he needs to collect all seven Dragon Balls."
"How do Bulma and Goku get their third dragon ball?"
"It was a gift from Master Roshi"
"They found it at the top of a Mountain"
"They bougth it at an antique shop"
"Bulma demands a prize from Roshi, despite Turtle's comments that Goku was the only one who helped him. She immediately notices the Dragon Ball hanging from Master Roshi's neck and asks for it."
"What is the name of Master Roshi's school?"
"The Turtle School is a Martial Arts school founded by Master Roshi which presumably continues the teachings of Roshi's former sensei, Master Mutaito."
"It was invented by Master Roshi by practicing for fifty years spanning pre-Dragon Ball. By drawing his latent ki into the palms of his hands, Roshi is able to expel an explosive beam of ki energy."
"The Flying Nimbus is a magical, yellow cloud that serves as a way of transportation. Goku obtains the Nimbus from Master Roshi as compensation for saving Turtle."
"What are the principles of Master Roshi training?"
"Work hard, Study well and eat and sleep plenty… that’s the turtle hermit way to learn!”"
Back in original DB, Bulma reveals that she wants to wish for a boyfriend. But when Yamcha catches her eye, she changes priority to wishing for a lifetime supply of strawberries.

""Jackie Chun" is simply Master Roshi wearing a wig.To show his pupils, Goku and Krillin, that as strong as they'd become, there are still plenty warriors out there in the world who are more powerful than they are."
"Who is the leader of the Pilaf gang?"
"The Pilaf Gang is a group run by Emperor Pilaf that tries to obtain the Dragon Balls for Pilaf, so he can rule Earth."
"What prize is awarded to the winner of the Martial Arts Tournament? "
"Besides the title of World Martial Arts Champion, the winner of the tournament receives the considerable amount of 500,000 Zeni (later increased to ten million Zeni) as a prize."
"Who was the only female fighter in the 21st World Tournament?"
"Ranfan was one of the eight fighters to make it to the quarter finals in the 21st World Tournament and the only female fighter."
"What was the Nam participant planning to do with the tournament money?"

"His motivation to compete in the Tournament was in order to win the prize money so that he could use it to purchase and provide a water supply for his village that was suffering from drought, showing the caring and generous side of Nam. "
"Giran is a Giras(a race of pterodactyl-like monster beasts. ) that entered the 21st World Martial Arts Tournament where he fought Goku."
"How did Nam get water for his people?"

"Being defeated, however, he is unable to get the money to buy water and decides to leave. Master Roshi reads his mind and gets acquainted with his intentions. He then gives him a capsule so that he can store water from a well."
"Who was the winner of the battle between Jackie Chun and Yamcha?"
"Jackie Chun counterattacks by sweeping his hand toward Yamcha creating a massive gust of wind. The force of the wind knocks Yamcha out of bounds, though Jackie Chun did not actually strike him."
"Who is the champion of the 21st World Martial Arts Tournament?"
"Jackie Chun won the title of champion at the 21st Tenkaichi Budokai. He fougth against Goku, and to avoid that he turns into Ozaru. He deafeat him with a max power kamehameha."
"Who was the first human to ride the Flying Nimbus?"
"Nam was able to ride the Flying Nimbus when Goku rescued him in the episode "The Roaming Lake"."
"The goal of the Red Ribbon Army is to use any means necessary to obtain the Dragon Balls and wish for world domination."
"The Flying Fortress was destroyed when Colonel Silver and his soldiers shot it down in a heated desert in order to get the Dragon Ball."

"Android 8, who goes by the name Eighter as suggested by Goku, is Dr. Gero's eighth Android creation. He is designed to serve the Red Ribbon Army but is seen as faulty because of his good-spirited nature."
"The Senzu Bean's restoring properties mend and heal all physical harm to person."

"The Taiyōken is a technique developed by the Tsuru-Sen Style Dōjō, and was used exclusively by them before Son Gokū memorized the technique and became the first non-Tsuru-Sen Style Dōjō fighter to employ it."
"What monster is Android No.8 based on?"
"Android 8 is a android that takes on the form of a large, stocky man resembling Frankenstein's monster - whom he is presumably based of."
"Commander Red, is the commander-in-chief of the most feared and ruthless militaristic crime organization: the Red Ribbon Army."
"What move did Goku use to defeat Piccolo?"
"Goku fired a reverse, one-handed Kamehameha and propelled himself at full-speed towards King Piccolo, punching him clean through his torso–an attack that would become known as "Penetrate!" punch."

"Tenshinhan was the champion of the 22nd Tenkaichi Budokai. As a student of Tsuru School martial arts, he found a rival in Goku after the latter defeated his fellow disciple and the brother of Tsurusennin, the assassin Taopaipai."

"Gohan is a half-breed Saiyan and one of the most prominent characters in the series. He is the elder son of the series primary protagonist Goku and his wife Chi-Chi. He is named after Goku's adoptive grandfather, Gohan."

"Raditz is a mid-class Saiyan warrior, the older brother of Goku and the eldest son of Bardock and Gine. He is one of the few remaining full-blooded Saiyans left alive after his homeworld was destroyed. He is the first antagonist in DBZ."

"Saiyans are a race of extraterrestrials. They are a naturally aggressive warrior race who were supposedly striving to be the strongest in the universe. Nearly all of the Saiyans from Universe 7 were obliterated by Frieza."

"Goku, born Kakarot. Originally sent to Earth by his parents as an infant. A head injury at an early age altered Goku's memory, ridding him of his initial destructive nature and allowing him to grow up to become one of Earth's greatest defenders."
"Who did sacrifice himself to save Gohan in the Saiyan Saga?"
"Nappa fires a Bomber DX at Gohan, but Piccolo jumps in front of the boy and takes the blast to himself. Though he is still standing when the smoke clears, he falls to the ground, mortally wounded. "
"What is the name of the Saiyan's home planet?"
"Planet Vegeta, formerly known as Planet Plant, is the home planet of Goku, Vegeta, and all other native Saiyans, Tuffles and the Inhabitants of Plant in the Dragon Ball franchise."
"What is the name of the technique Piccolo uses to defeat Raditz?"
"Special Beam Cannon is a technique used by Piccolo and is one of his signature attacks. Piccolo uses the Special Beam Cannon in a battle for the first time in the battle against Raditz."
"What is Nappa and Vegeta's objective on Earth?"

"Raditz, relays Piccolo's explanation about Earth's Dragon Balls to Nappa and Vegeta in the hopes that they'll come to use the balls to revive him. Nappa does briefly consider wishing Raditz back to life, but Vegeta instead decides to use the balls for them to wish for immortality."

"Saibamen are green, humanoid creatures that grow from a planted seed placed in the ground. The bulbs are stored in a special liquid prior to their use by a Saiyan. They are considered part of the Alien race."
"A Saiyan who born with a low power level"

"Goku was considered a low class saiyan because he was born with a 'low' Power Level while Broly(non-canon) was born with a 'higher' Power Level. Considering Power level decides the class of a Saiyan then Adult Goku trumps Vegeta."
"Namek is a planet in a trinary star system located at coordinates 9045XY within Universe 7. It is the home planet of Piccolo, Dende, and other Namekians."
"Which one is a difference between Namekian Dragon Balls and Earth Dragon Balls?"
"Can grant the same wish more than once"

"The summoner is required to utter a Namekian password in order to summon Porunga. He has the ability to grant three wishes, that are somewhat different in power to Shenron's wishes. For example, he can grant the same wish more than once."
"Dende is a Namekian with a unique gift that allows him to heal others. He is the 108th son of Grand Elder Guru. On Goku's request, Dende becomes the Earth's Guardian in Kami's place."
"Who does Piccolo merge with in Frieza Saga?"

"Piccolo arrives on the planet and discovers the battered Namekian. Nail asks Piccolo to fuse with him in order to increase his chances against Frieza. After they fuse, Piccolo's power level increases dramatically to the point of being even with that of Frieza's second form."
"The Ginyu Force are an elite group of mercenaries employed by Frieza to conquer planets as a part of his army. "
"Goku effortlessly defeats the powerful Recoome in one blow to the midsection, thanks to his training in the ship. Gohan, Krillin, and Vegeta all marvel at Goku's extreme power."
"What animal does Captain Ginyu turn into?"

"Finally, Vegeta throws Ginyu into the air, where Ginyu prepares for the technique again. Goku, however, notices a nearby frog and throws it towards Vegeta as the beam approaches him. Therefore Ginyu changes his body with the animal."
"What is Frieza's power level in his Second Form?"
"Boasting a Power Level of over one million, he displayed his ferocious strength by blowing up the area around him by simply raising his hand into the air!"
"How were everyone on Namek transported to Earth?"
"By means of the instant transmission technique"
"King Kai telepathically contacts Grand Elder Guru and tells him of their plan to use Porunga's final wish to send everyone on Namek to Earth except for Frieza."
"Where is Goku when he does turn into Super Saiyan for the first time?"
"Goku was on Namek fighting Frieza when he first became Super Saiyan."
"What is Goku's job at the beginning of DBS?"

"Sometime has passed since the defeat of Kid Buu and Chi-Chi makes Goku get a job since the Ox-King has been running low on money to support them, so he starts working as a radish farmer, although he really wants to train. "
"What did Videl receive as a Wedding Present from Goten and Trunks?"

"Goten wants to give Videl a wedding present. He asks Trunks for advice and they go off searching for. They decide to get her a bottle of fresh spring water that they got right near a hot spring that can be used to make her skin soft."
"Who trapped Old Kai in the Z Sword?"

"Beerus and Old Kai got into an argument over some trifling thing and a certain short-tempered God of Destruction, sealed Old Kai away inside the Z Sword as it would not have been proper for him to destroy the Sacred World of the Kais itself."
"How many pure-hearted Saiyans are needed to summon the Super Saiyan God?"
"It requires five righteous Saiyans to perform and a sixth Saiyan to channel the ritual and ki into, each as Super Saiyan."

"Yamoshi is an ancient Saiyan who could transform into a Super Saiyan long before Goku could. After his death, his spirit wandered in search of six pure-hearted Saiyans, to create the ceremony that would birth the first Super Saiyan God."
"Why do Buu and Beerus fight in the Battle of the Gods?"

" Whis informs Beerus that there is supposed to be some delicious custard pudding and that Majin Buu is currently eating some. Beerus politely asks Buu for one and Whis asks for two, but Buu refuses, stating he will eat them all himself."
"Who is the scientist who creates the androids?"
"Dr. Gero, the scientist that unleashed Androids 16 to 19 and Cell upon the world, was a relatively short-lived villain in DBZ."
"Who becomes the target of revenge by the androids in his saga?"

"Dr. Gero is a former member of the Red Ribbon, a military organization that Goku defeated when he was a kid. Gero became obsessed with getting revenge on Goku and decided to use his scientific knowledge to create very powerful androids."
"What was the Android 18's name when she was human?"
"Lazuli was her name when she was human. Then, when she was modified she passed to be called Android Number 18."
"What is the name of Cell's initial form?"

"In his Imperfect form, Cell has transitioned to walking upright and has a humanoid shape, but retains many insectoid features from his previous form, including his horns, beak-like mouth, three-toed feet, five-fingered hands and segmented armor. "
"What transformation does goku get against Baby?"

"After being defeated by Baby as a Super Saiyan 3, Goku pursued a greater power. Goku obtained Super Saiyan 4 by first regaining his Saiyan tail with help from Old Kai, Sugoro, and Shusugoro. This allowed Goku to transform into a Golden Oozaru."
